import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import "./CartPage.scss"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { removeFromCart, toggleCartQty, getCartTotal, clearCart, setCartTotal } from '../../store/cartSlice'; import { formatPrice } from "../../utils/helpers"; import Pagination from '../../components/Pagination/Pagination'; const CartPage = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { data: cartProducts, totalItems, totalAmount, deliveryCharge } = useSelector(state => state.cart); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getCartTotal()); }, [cartProducts]); const emptyCartMsg =

No items found!

; const cartItemsPerPage = 5; // Number of cart items to display per page const totalPages = Math.ceil(cartProducts.length / cartItemsPerPage); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * cartItemsPerPage; const endIndex = startIndex + cartItemsPerPage; const handleQtyIncrease = (productId) => { dispatch(toggleCartQty({ id: productId, type: "INC" })); dispatch(getCartTotal()); // Update cart total after quantity change }; return (
  • Cart

My Cart

{cartProducts.length === 0 ? emptyCartMsg : (
{cartProducts.slice(startIndex, endIndex).map(cartProduct => (
{cartProduct.title}
Qty:
{cartProduct.quantity}
Price : {formatPrice(cartProduct.price)}.00
Sub Total: {formatPrice(cartProduct.totalPrice)}
))}
Order Summary
  • Selected {totalItems} items(s) Price {formatPrice(totalAmount)}
  • Discount -  {formatPrice(0)}
  • Delivery Cost + {formatPrice(deliveryCharge / 100)}
Grand Total: {formatPrice(totalAmount + deliveryCharge / 100)}
)}
) } export default CartPage;
